thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 4 of 417
thread.title: Walter S

author: Walter S
title: Walter S
text: I received my order , minus the Back to the Future Blu-Ray and Donnie Brasco Blu-Ray. I had no knowledge that I wouldn't be getting them. I had to call about the missing items and was told if they come back in stock in the next ten days they would be sent. If not I would have to keep checking to see if they came in. Not cool. The only reason I placed the order in the first place was because of the Back to the Future set. I'm gonna have to think long and hard about ordering from you again.
